data.title: Women’s Soccer Picked 12th in SBC Preseason Coaches Poll
data.meta_description: CONWAY, S.C. - The Coastal Carolina women's soccer team was picked to finish 12th in the 2024 Sun Belt Conference women's soccer preseason coaches poll, the league
data.text:
CONWAY, S.C. - The Coastal Carolina women's soccer team was picked to finish 12th in the 2024 Sun Belt Conference women's soccer preseason coaches poll, the league announced on Wednesday.

CCU received 55 points to finish ahead of Marshall (48 points) and Troy (45 points).

Back-to-back reigning Sun Belt Conference Tournament champion Old Dominion was picked to finish first with 181 points and seven first-place votes. James Madison finished just behind in second place with 177 points and three first-place votes.

ULM followed in third with 138 points while Georgia Southern and Georgia State tied for the fourth spot with 134 points each. The sixth slot was tied between Appalachian State and South Alabama with 126 points and one first-place vote apiece.

Texas State was picked eighth (118 points), Louisiana placed ninth (74 points), and Arkansas State and Southern Miss tied for 10th with 57 points.

2024 Sun Belt Women's Soccer Preseason Coaches Poll

1. Old Dominion (7) – 181

2. James Madison (3) – 177

3. ULM – 138

T4. Georgia Southern - 134

T4. Georgia State (1) - 134

T6. App State (1) - 126

T6. South Alabama (1) - 126

8. Texas State - 118

9. Louisiana - 74

T10. Arkansas State - 57

T10. Southern Miss - 57

12. Coastal Carolina - 55

13. Marshall (1) - 48

14. Troy – 45

Parentheses indicate first-place votes

The grand opening of the new CCU Soccer Complex will take place on Aug. 14 at 6 p.m. ET, followed immediately by a free youth clinic at 6:30 p.m. ET.

CCU will welcome Richmond for the first regular season match of the season on Aug. 15. Kick off is set for 7 p.m. ET.

For complete coverage of CCU women's soccer, follow the Chants on social media @CoastalWSoccer (X), facebook.com/CCUChanticleers (Facebook), @GoCCUSports (Instagram), or visit the official home of Coastal Carolina Athletics at goccusports.com
